document_data.title: The Family Business
document_data.author: [[James Lowder]]
document_data.realm year: [[Uktar]] [[1335 DR]]{{Cite web/Presenting...Seven Millennia of Realms Fiction}}
document_data.mainbody: '''"The Family Business"''' is a short story by [[James Lowder]] included in the 1993 anthology ''[[Realms of Valor]]''.
document_data.Summary: A young [[Artus Cimber]] and his father, the highwayman known as the [[Scoril Cimber|Shadowhawk]], inadvertently rob Prince [[Azoun Obarskyr IV|Azoun]] of [[Cormyr]], but end up saving him from [[Zhentarim]] assassins in the process.
